extDescription.message: Create structured reading experiences with dividers, transparent blocks, and sticky notes. Features auto-saving and sync.

addDivider.description: Button text for adding a divider

addReadingCard.description: Button text for adding a reading card

addNote.description: Button text for adding a sticky note

instructionDrag.message: All elements can be dragged to adjust position

instructionDelete.message: Hover over elements to see delete button (top right)

instructionResize.message: Drag corner dots to resize elements

instructionNoteInput.message: Sticky notes can have multi-line text

errorUnsupported.message: FocusTint Reader cannot work on this page.

errorUseOnRegular.message: Please use this extension on regular web pages.
errorUseOnRegular.description: Additional error message for unsupported pages

readingMaskTitle.description: Title for the reading mask feature

readingMaskDescription.message: Enable reading mask to show only the current reading line, reducing visual distractions.
readingMaskDescription.description: Description for the reading mask feature

closeReadingMask.description: Button to close the reading mask

adjustHeight.description: Label for the slider to adjust transparent area height

lockPosition.message: Pin to screen (currently scrolls with page)

highlighterTooltip.message: Highlighter mode active - Select text to highlight (Click the cursor icon to exit)

aboutInfoTooltip.description: Tooltip for info button on instructions page
